SELECT ROUND(SUM(a.BM),1) from ( SELECT sum(h.BM) BM,h.TYPE,ou.UNITTYPE from ( SELECT v.UNITTYPE,v.UNITID from (SELECT ID FROM t_emc_org o WHERE FIND_IN_SET( ID, emc_func_org_getchilds (#{orgId,jdbcType=VARCHAR})) and o.COM_ID=#{comId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) c,v_emc_unit v
WHERE c.ID=v.ORGID and v.HEAT_TYPE=#{feetType,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and v.UNITTYPE='1' GROUP BY v.UNITID,v.UNITTYPE ) ou LEFT JOIN (SELECT fd.UNITID,SUM(fd.DOSAGE*fd.COAL_COEF) BM,et.TYPE FROM ${tableName} fd LEFT JOIN t_emc_energy_type et on fd.TYPEID=et.ID WHERE fd.DOSAGE_TIME >= #{startTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND fd.DOSAGE_TIME <= #{endTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and et.TYPE!=4 GROUP BY fd.UNITID,et.TYPE) h on ou.UNITID=h.UNITID GROUP BY h.TYPE,ou.UNITTYPE ) a
